email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is October 20-25. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Given the current market, could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I understand your concern. After reviewing the market, I can adjust the rate to $48.50 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and I can provide the full specs if needed. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. $48.50 is more in line with our expectations. We can proceed with this rate, but could you confirm the laycan is still October 20-25? Also, please send over the full vessel specs and demurrage terms for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. Yes, the laycan remains October 20-25. I’ve attached the full vessel specs and demurrage terms for your review. Let me know if you need anything else to finalize the deal. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. We’ll proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $48.50 per metric ton, laycan October 20-25. Please send over the contract for review and signature. Thanks for your assistance. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news! I’ll prepare the contract and send it over for your review and signature by end of day. Thanks for your business, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
